qas.question: What was the name of the hairdresser's assistant Schwarzenegger fell for in July of 1977?
Where did Schwarzenegger first meet Maria Shriver?

answers.text: the Robert F. Kennedy Tennis Tournament

qas.question: What month and year did Moray make Schwarzenegger choose between her and Shriver?

context: Schwarzenegger met his next paramour, <a0_0>Sue Moray<a0_0/>, a Beverly Hills hairdresser's assistant, on Venice Beach in July 1977. According to Moray, the couple led an open relationship: "We were faithful when we were both in LA … but when he was out of town, we were free to do whatever we wanted." Schwarzenegger met Maria Shriver at <a1_0>the Robert F. Kennedy Tennis Tournament<a1_0/> in August 1977, and went on to have a relationship with both women until <a2_0>August 1978<a2_0/>, when Moray (who knew of his relationship with Shriver) issued an ultimatum.
